rules_text:
[i]Alcryst's Retainer[/i] – Whenever a creature you control with haste attacks, Citrinne, Caring Noble deals 2 damage to target opponent.
[i]Generosity[/i] – Whenever you sacrifice a token to activate an ability, copy that ability.
[i]Tome of Luxuries[/i] – Whenever Citrinne deals damage to a player, create two tapped Treasure tokens.
